titles.title: Air Force One Built in America Act
Air Force One Built in America Act
To require that the aircraft used as Air Force One by the President be an aircraft that is made in America by an American-owned company.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: Air Force One Built in America Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Defense to enter into a contract for the procurement of an aircraft for use as Air Force One by the President only if it is manufactured in the United States by an American-owned company.
